description: Details of a landscaping plan pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission Ref: 243285FUL dated 30.01.2025 'Conversion of dwellinghouse into two self-contained flats with provision of refuse storage; and amenity space; rear dormer window roof extension; alterations to existing rear elevation fenestrations involving replacement of doors and windows with bifold doors
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission
243285FUL dated 30.01.2025  is deemed to be unsatisfactory and does
not meet the requirements of the condition. Council has concerns with the limited details of the
plans. Specifically details of the height and materials of the boundary
treatment, the provision of planting in the forecourt and any new surfacing
materials to be used have not been provided.
The proposal would therefore fail to improve the visual amenity of the property through urban greening in accordance with policies 5.10 and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management
DPD (2013), policies D8, G4 and G5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National
